snippet: David H. Petraeus, the director of the Central Intelligence Agency, may visit Myanmar later this year, officials said Tuesday, signaling a further warming of relations.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency Director David H Petraeus may visit Myanmar this year, in what would be the latest signal of warming relations with the United States as Myanmar emerges from years of military rule and diplomatic isolation.
lead_paragraph: David H. Petraeus, the director of the Central Intelligence Agency, may visit Myanmar later this year, officials said Tuesday, signaling a further warming of relations.

headline.seo: David H. Petraeus Signals Possible Visit to Myanmar
headline.main: Myanmar Visit Is Possible for Petraeus
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Visit Is Possible For Petraeus
